name: Deuterium
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
"DAM is a decentralized, global liquidity infrastructure for powering value mobility between sovereign web3 networks. It helps blockchains scale native liquidity and improves capital efficiency across the fragmented digital assets space."

d2o is a decentralized multichain stablecoin built to move liquidity wherever users need it through native deployments and teleportation (burn on source chain, mint on destination chain).
